              def initialize(profile: nil, user: nil, text: "", size: :md, placeholder_type: :initials, tooltip: nil)
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            
              
            

                @profile = profile || (user.respond_to?(:profile) ? user.profile : user)

    14. 
            

            
              
            

                @text = text.to_s  # Convert nil to empty string immediately

              def has_avatar?
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            
              
            

                @profile&.respond_to?(:avatar_medium) &&
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            
              
            

                @profile&.respond_to?(:avatar_thumbnail) &&
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            
              
            

                @profile&.avatar_medium&.attached? &&
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43.

              def render_avatar
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            
              
            

                wrapper_classes = [ "inline-block", SIZES[@size] || SIZES[:md], "rounded-full" ]
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            
              
            

                content_tag :div, class: wrapper_classes.join(" ") do
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Use thumbnail for small sizes, medium for larger ones
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            
              
            

                  avatar = %i[xs sm].include?(@size) ? @profile.avatar_thumbnail : @profile.avatar_medium
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Add HTML comment with image size info before the image tag
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            
              
            

                  comment = "<!-- Avatar: #{avatar.blob.filename} (#{ActiveSupport::NumberHelper.number_to_human_size(avatar.blob.byte_size)}) -->"
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            
              
            

                  (comment + image_tag(avatar,
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            
              
            

                    class: "rounded-full object-cover w-full h-full",
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            
              
            

                    alt: resolve_name || "Avatar")).html_safe
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      60.

              def render_icon
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            
              
            

                content_tag :div, class: "w-full h-full rounded-full flex items-center justify-center
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            
              
            

                                        bg-surface-100 text-surface-600" do
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Create SVG with proper nesting
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            
              
            

                  tag.svg(xmlns: "http://www.w3.org/2000/svg",
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            
              
            

                          fill: "none",
          
      85.

                          class: "w-1/2 h-1/2") do
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88.

      89.

                    concat tag.rect(width: "4", height: "6", x: "2", y: "9")
          
      90.

      91.

              def initials
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            
              
            

                text = @text.presence || resolve_name.to_s
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            
              
            

                # Special handling for "Unknown"
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            
              
            

                return "UN" if text == "Unknown"
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            
              
            

                return "??" if text.blank?
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            
              
            

                # Get first letters of each word, up to 2 letters
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            
              
            

                text.split.map(&:first).join("")[0, 2].upcase
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            
              
            

              def resolve_name
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            
              
            

                if @profile.respond_to?(:display_name) && @profile.display_name.present?
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            
              
            

                  @profile.display_name
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            
              
            

                elsif @profile.respond_to?(:name) && @profile.name.present?
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            
              
            

                  @profile.name
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            
              
            

                elsif @profile.respond_to?(:full_name) && @profile.full_name.present?
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            
              
            

                  @profile.full_name
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            
              
            

                else
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            
              
            

                  "Unknown"

    115.

              def variant_options(size)

    53. 
            

            
              
            

                case size
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            
              
            

                when :thumbnail
          
      55.

                when :small

                when :medium
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59.

      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            
              
            

                when :large
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            
              
            

                  { resize_to_limit: [ 1200, 800 ], format: :webp, saver: { quality: 80 } }
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            
              
            

                when :original
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63.

              class FeatureCardComponent < ViewComponent::Base
          
      5.

              def valid_image?

                # Handle polymorphic Image model

                # Handle direct ActiveStorage attachments

                # Handle ActiveStorage variants

    43. 
            

            
              
            

                @image.is_a?(ActiveStorage::VariantWithRecord) ||
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            
              
            

                @image.is_a?(ActiveStorage::Variant)

      46.

      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            
              
            

              # URL generation is only safe during rendering
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            
              
            

              def url_for_image
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            
              
            

                # For original size, bypass variant processing completely
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            
              
            

                if @size == :original
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            
              
            

                  if @image.respond_to?(:file) && @image.file.attached?
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            
              
            

                    return Rails.application.routes.url_helpers.rails_blob_url(@image.file)
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            
              
            

                  elsif @image.respond_to?(:attached?) && @image.attached?
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            
              
            

                    return Rails.application.routes.url_helpers.rails_blob_url(@image)
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            
              
            

                  elsif @image.is_a?(ActiveStorage::VariantWithRecord) || @image.is_a?(ActiveStorage::Variant)
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            
              
            

                    return Rails.application.routes.url_helpers.rails_blob_url(@image.blob)
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            
              
            

                # For other sizes, use variant processing
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            
              
            

                if @image.respond_to?(:file) && @image.file.attached?
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            
              
            

                  # For polymorphic Image model
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.application.routes.url_helpers.rails_blob_url(@image.file.variant(variant_options))
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            
              
            

                elsif @image.respond_to?(:attached?) && @image.attached?
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            
              
            

                  # For direct ActiveStorage attachments
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66.

                  # GET /api/v1/auth/email/verify/:token

                  def show
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            
              
            

                    self.resource = resource_class.confirm_by_token(params[:token])
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            
              
            

                    if resource.errors.empty?
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            
              
            

                      # Sign in the user after confirmation if they're not signed in
          
      25.

                      sign_in(resource) unless user_signed_in?
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            
              
            

                      
          
      27.

                      # Get the latest token if we signed them in
          
      28.

                      token = resource.allowlisted_jwts.order(created_at: :desc).first if user_signed_in?
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            
              
            

                      render json: {
          
      31.

                class ContactsController < Api::V1::BaseController
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            
              
            

                  include Pagy::Backend
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            
              
            

                  before_action :set_contact, only: [ :update, :destroy ]
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            
              
            

                  def index
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            
              
            

                    contacts = Current.organization.contacts
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            
              
            

                    contacts = contacts.search(params[:search]) if params[:search].present?
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            
              
            

                    contacts = case params[:order_by]
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            
              
            

                    when "name"
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            
              
            

                        contacts.order(name: params[:order_direction] || :asc)
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            
              
            

                    when "email"
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            
              
            

                        contacts.order(email: params[:order_direction] || :asc)
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            
              
            

                    when "visits"
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            
              
            

                        contacts.left_joins(:visits)
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            
              
            

                               .group(:id)
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            
              
            

                               .order("COUNT(visits.id) #{params[:order_direction] || 'desc'}")
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            
              
            

                    else
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            
              
            

                        contacts.order(created_at: params[:order_direction] || :desc)
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            
              
            

                    pagy, records = pagy(contacts)
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            
              
            

                    render json: ContactSerializer.render_collection(records, pagy: pagy)
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            
              
            

                  rescue Pagy::OverflowError
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            
              
            

                    last_page = (contacts.count.to_f / Pagy::DEFAULT[:items]).ceil
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            
              
            

                    pagy, _ = pagy(contacts, page: last_page)
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            
              
            

                    render json: ContactSerializer.render_collection([], pagy: pagy), status: :ok
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            
              
            

                  rescue StandardError => e
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            
              
            

                    Rails.logger.error "Index error: #{e.class.name}: #{e.message}"
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            
              
            

                    Rails.logger.error e.backtrace.join("\n")
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            
              
            

                    render json: {
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            
              
            

                      status: "error",
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            
              
            

                      errors: [{ code: "general_error", detail: e.message }]
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            
              
            

                    }, status: :internal_server_error
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            
              
            

                  def show
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            
              
            

                    @contact = Current.organization.contacts.find(params[:id])
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            
              
            

                    if params[:include]&.include?("visits")
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            
              
            

                      @contact = Contact.includes(
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            
              
            

                        visits: [
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            
              
            

                          :restaurant,
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            
              
            

                          :images,
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            
              
            

                          :contacts,
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            
              
            

                          { restaurant: :cuisine_type }
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            
              
            

                        ]
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            
              
            

                      ).where(id: @contact.id).first
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            
              
            

                    render json: ContactSerializer.render_success(@contact)
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            
              
            

                  rescue ActiveRecord::RecordNotFound
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            
              
            

                    render json: {
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            
              
            

                      status: "error",
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58.

      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            
              
            

                    }, status: :not_found
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            
              
            

                  rescue StandardError => e
          
      61.

                  def create
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            
              
            

                    contact = nil
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            
              
            

                    Contact.transaction do
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            
              
            

                      contact = Current.organization.contacts.build(contact_params_without_avatar)
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            
              
            

                      contact.save!
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            
              
            

                      if params.dig(:contact, :avatar).present?
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            
              
            

                        avatar = params.dig(:contact, :avatar)
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            
              
            

                        result = PreprocessAvatarService.call(avatar)
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            
              
            

                        if result[:success]
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            
              
            

                          contact.avatar_medium.attach(result[:variants][:medium])
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            
              
            

                          contact.avatar_thumbnail.attach(result[:variants][:thumbnail])
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            
              
            

                        else
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            
              
            

                          contact.errors.add(:avatar, result[:error])
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            
              
            

                          raise ActiveRecord::RecordInvalid.new(contact)
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            
              
            

                        end
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86.

      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87.

    88. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      89.

      90.

                  rescue ActiveRecord::RecordInvalid => e

      92.

                      status: "error",
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            
              
            

                      errors: errors

                  def update
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            
              
            

                    Contact.transaction do
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            
              
            

                      @contact = Current.organization.contacts.find(params[:id])
          
      115.

                      @contact.update!(contact_params_without_avatar)
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            
              
            

                      if params.dig(:contact, :avatar).present?
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            
              
            

                        # Remove old avatars if they exist
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            
              
            

                        @contact.avatar_medium.purge if @contact.avatar_medium.attached?
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            
              
            

                        @contact.avatar_thumbnail.purge if @contact.avatar_thumbnail.attached?
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            
              
            

                        avatar = params.dig(:contact, :avatar)
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            
              
            

                        result = PreprocessAvatarService.call(avatar)
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            
              
            

                        if result[:success]
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            
              
            

                          @contact.avatar_medium.attach(result[:variants][:medium])
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            
              
            

                          @contact.avatar_thumbnail.attach(result[:variants][:thumbnail])
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            
              
            

                        else
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            
              
            

                          @contact.errors.add(:avatar, result[:error])
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            
              
            

                          raise ActiveRecord::RecordInvalid.new(@contact)
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            
              
            

                        end
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            
              
            

                      end
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133.

                  def destroy
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            
              
            

                    @contact.destroy!
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159.

                  rescue StandardError => e
          
      161.

      168.

      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            
              
            

                  def search
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            
              
            

                    query = params[:query].to_s.strip
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            
              
            

                    contacts = Current.organization.contacts
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            
              
            

                    if query.present?
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            
              
            

                      contacts = contacts.search(query)
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            
              
            

                    pagy, records = pagy(contacts.order(created_at: :desc))
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            
              
            

                    render json: ContactSerializer.render_collection(records, pagy: pagy)
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            
              
            

                  rescue StandardError => e
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            
              
            

                    Rails.logger.error "Search error: #{e.class.name}: #{e.message}"
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            
              
            

                    Rails.logger.error e.backtrace.join("\n")
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            
              
            

                    render json: {
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            
              
            

                      status: "error",
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            
              
            

                      errors: [{ code: "general_error", detail: e.message }]
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            
              
            

                    }, status: :internal_server_error
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      188.

                  private

                    # First, find the list

    76. 
            

            
              
            

                    
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Check if the list is editable by the current organization

                    # This includes both owned lists and shared lists with edit permission

                      share = Share.where(

    87.

    132. 
            

            
              
            

                      return
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            
              
            

                    
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            
              
            

                    Rails.logger.debug "=== DEBUG: ListsController#create ==="
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            
              
            

                    Rails.logger.debug "Current.organization: #{Current.organization.inspect}"
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            
              
            

                    Rails.logger.debug "Params: #{params.inspect}"
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            
              
            

                    
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            
              
            

                    begin
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            
              
            

                      list = Current.organization.lists.build(list_params.merge(creator: current_user))
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            
              
            

                      Rails.logger.debug "Built list: #{list.inspect}"

    144.

    145. 
            

            
              
            

                      if list.save
          
      146.

                        render json: ListSerializer.render_success(list), status: :created

      149.

                        render json: BaseSerializer.render_validation_errors(list), status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      150.

                      end
          
      151.

                  def update

                  def create

                  def update
          
      22.

                    if resource.errors.empty?

    54. 
            

            
              
            

                  def destroy_avatar
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            
              
            

                    if @profile.avatar_medium.attached? || @profile.avatar_thumbnail.attached?

      57.

      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            
              
            

                      render json: ProfileSerializer.render_success(@profile)
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            
              
            

                    else
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            
              
            

                      render json: ProfileSerializer.render_error([ "No avatar to delete" ]),
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            
              
            

                             status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      62.

                    end
          
      63.

                  def search
