    44. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            
              
            

                    # First check if the restaurant is valid (name, etc.)
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            
              
            

                    unless restaurant.valid?
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            
              
            

                      return render_error(restaurant.errors.full_messages.join(", "), :unprocessable_entity)
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Then handle cuisine_type_name if provided
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            
              
            

                    if restaurant_params[:cuisine_type_name].present?
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            
              
            

                      valid, result = validate_cuisine_type(restaurant_params[:cuisine_type_name])
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            
              
            

                      unless valid
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            
              
            

                        return render_error(result, :unprocessable_entity)
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            
              
            

                      end
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            
              
            

                      restaurant.cuisine_type = result
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            
              
            

                    else
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            
              
            

                      return render_error("Cuisine type is required", :unprocessable_entity)
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Add location data directly to the restaurant if provided
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            
              
            

                    if location_params.present?
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            
              
            

                      restaurant.assign_attributes(
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            
              
            

                        address: location_params[:address],
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            
              
            

                        city: location_params[:city],
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            
              
            

                        street: location_params[:street],
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            
              
            

                        street_number: location_params[:street_number],
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            
              
            

                        postal_code: location_params[:postal_code],
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            
              
            

                        country: location_params[:country],
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            
              
            

                        latitude: location_params[:latitude],
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            
              
            

                        longitude: location_params[:longitude]
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            
              
            

                      )
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Optionally associate with Google restaurant if place ID is provided
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            
              
            

                    if params[:google_place_id].present?
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            
              
            

                      google_restaurant = GoogleRestaurant.find_by(google_place_id: params[:google_place_id])
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            
              
            

                      restaurant.google_restaurant = google_restaurant if google_restaurant
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            
              
            

                      
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            
              
            

                      # If we have a Google restaurant but no location data in the restaurant itself,
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            
              
            

                      # copy the location data from the Google restaurant
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            
              
            

                      if google_restaurant && (!restaurant.latitude || !restaurant.longitude)
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            
              
            

                        restaurant.latitude = google_restaurant.latitude
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            
              
            

                        restaurant.longitude = google_restaurant.longitude
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            
              
            

                      end
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            
              
            

                    if restaurant.save
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            
              
            

                      if restaurant_params[:images].present?
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            
              
            

                        result = ImageProcessorService.new(restaurant, restaurant_params[:images]).process
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            
              
            

                        unless result.success?
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            
              
            

                          restaurant.destroy
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            
              
            

                          return render_error(result.error)
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            
              
            

                        end
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            
              
            

                      end
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            
              
            

                      render json: RestaurantSerializer.render_success(restaurant), status: :created
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            
              
            

                    else
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            
              
            

                      render_error(restaurant.errors.full_messages.join(", "), :unprocessable_entity)
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            
              
            

                  rescue ActionController::ParameterMissing => e
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            
              
            

                    render_error(e.message, :unprocessable_entity)
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            
              
            

                  rescue StandardError => e
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            
              
            

                    render_error(e.message)
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            
              
            

                  def update
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            
              
            

                    ActiveRecord::Base.transaction do
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            
              
            

                      updater = RestaurantUpdater.new(@restaurant, restaurant_params.except(:images))
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            
              
            

                      if updater.update
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            
              
            

                        if restaurant_params[:images].present?
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            
              
            

                          result = ImageProcessorService.new(@restaurant, restaurant_params[:images]).process
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            
              
            

                          unless result.success?
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            
              
            

                            raise StandardError, result.error
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            
              
            

                          end
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            
              
            

                        end
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            
              
            

                        render_success(@restaurant)
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            
              
            

                      else
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            
              
            

                        render_error(@restaurant.errors.full_messages.join(", "), :unprocessable_entity)
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            
              
            

                      end
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            
              
            

                  rescue StandardError => e
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            
              
            

                    render_error(e.message, :unprocessable_entity)
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            
              
            

                  def destroy
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            
              
            

                    if @restaurant.destroy
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            
              
            

                      head :no_content
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            
              
            

                    else
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            
              
            

                      render_error(@restaurant.errors.full_messages.join(", "))
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            
              
            

                  rescue StandardError => e
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            
              
            

                    render_error(e.message)
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            
              
            

                  def add_tag
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            
              
            

                    unless @restaurant
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            
              
            

                      # This is a fallback in case set_restaurant didn't properly halt the chain
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            
              
            

                      return render_error("Restaurant not found", :not_found)
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            
              
            

                    
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            
              
            

                    @restaurant.tag_list.add(params[:tag])
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            
              
            

                    if @restaurant.save
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            
              
            

                      render_success(@restaurant)
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            
              
            

                    else
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            
              
            

                      render_error(@restaurant.errors.full_messages.join(", "))
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            
              
            

                  rescue StandardError => e
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            
              
            

                    render_error(e.message)
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            
              
            

                  def remove_tag
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            
              
            

                    unless @restaurant
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            
              
            

                      # This is a fallback in case set_restaurant didn't properly halt the chain
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            
              
            

                      return render_error("Restaurant not found", :not_found)
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            
              
            

                    
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            
              
            

                    @restaurant.tag_list.remove(params[:tag])
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            
              
            

                    if @restaurant.save
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            
              
            

                      render_success(@restaurant)
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            
              
            

                    else
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            
              
            

                      render_error(@restaurant.errors.full_messages.join(", "))
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            
              
            

                  rescue StandardError => e
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            
              
            

                    render_error(e.message)
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            
              
            

                  private
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            
              
            

                  def set_restaurant
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            
              
            

                    Rails.logger.debug "=== DEBUG: set_restaurant called for #{params[:controller]}##{params[:action]} with ID: #{params[:id]} ==="
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            
              
            

                    @restaurant = Current.organization.restaurants.find(params[:id])
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            
              
            

                  rescue ActiveRecord::RecordNotFound => e
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            
              
            

                    Rails.logger.debug "=== DEBUG: Restaurant not found: #{e.message} ==="
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            
              
            

                    render_error("Restaurant not found", :not_found)
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            
              
            

                    false # Return false to halt the filter chain
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            
              
            

                  def search_params
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            
              
            

                    params.permit(
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            
              
            

                      :search, :tag, :latitude, :longitude, :per_page
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            
              
            

                    ).merge(organization: Current.organization)
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            
              
            

                  def restaurant_params
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            
              
            

                    params.require(:restaurant).permit(
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            
              
            

                      :name, :notes, :rating, :price_level,
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            
              
            

                      :cuisine_type_name, :favorite,
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            
              
            

                      :address, :city, :street, :street_number,
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            
              
            

                      :postal_code, :country, :phone_number, :url,
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            
              
            

                      tag_list: [],
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            
              
            

                      images: []
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            
              
            

                    )
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            
              
            

                  def location_params
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            
              
            

                    return nil unless params[:location].present?
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            
              
            

                    params.require(:location).permit(
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            
              
            

                      :address,
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            
              
            

                      :city,
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            
              
            

                      :street,
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            
              
            

                      :postal_code,
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            
              
            

                      :country,
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            
              
            

                      :latitude,
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            

            
              
            

                      :longitude
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            

            
              
            

                    )
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            

            
              
            

                  def parse_order_params
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            

            
              
            

                    return {} unless params[:order_by].present?
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            

            
              
            

                    unless RestaurantQuery::ALLOWED_ORDER_FIELDS.include?(params[:order_by])
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            

            
              
            

                      render_error("Invalid order_by parameter. Allowed values: #{RestaurantQuery::ALLOWED_ORDER_FIELDS.join(', ')}")
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            

            
              
            

                      return
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            

            
              
            

                    unless [ "asc", "desc" ].include?(params[:order_direction]&.downcase)
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            

            
              
            

                      render_error("Invalid order_direction parameter. Allowed values: asc, desc")
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            

            
              
            

                      return
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            

            
              
            

                    {
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            

            
              
            

                      order_by: params[:order_by],
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            

            
              
            

                      order_direction: params[:order_direction]&.downcase || "asc"
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            

            
              
            

                    }
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            

            
              
            

                  def render_collection(resources, meta: {}, pagy: nil)
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            

            
              
            

                    render json: RestaurantSerializer.render_collection(resources, meta: meta, pagy: pagy)
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      234. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    234. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      235. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    235. 
            

            
              
            

                  def render_success(resource, meta: {}, status: :ok)
          
      236. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    236. 
            

            
              
            

                    render json: RestaurantSerializer.render_success(resource, meta: meta), status: status
          
      237. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    237. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      238. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    238. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      239. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    239. 
            

            
              
            

                  def render_error(message, status = :unprocessable_entity, pointer = nil)
          
      240. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    240. 
            

            
              
            

                    render json: BaseSerializer.render_error(message, status, pointer), status: status
          
      241. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    241. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      242. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    242. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      243. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    243. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      244. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    244. 
            

            
              
            

            end
          
      245.

                  def create

                    user = User.find_by(email: user_params[:email])

    11.

                  # DELETE /api/v1/auth/session/current

                  def destroy
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Revoke the current token
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            
              
            

                    if current_user && current_jwt_payload
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            
              
            

                      begin
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            
              
            

                        jti = current_jwt_payload["jti"]
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            
              
            

                        current_user.revoke_jwt(jti, Devise.jwt.expiration_time.from_now)
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            
              
            

                        sign_out current_user
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            
              
            

                        render json: { message: "Signed out successfully" }
          
      66.

                      rescue => e

                        Rails.logger.error("Error in destroy: #{e.message}")
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68.

      69.

      70.

                    # Extract and validate the current token

                        # Find the user and check if token is valid
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            
              
            

                        user = User.find(payload["sub"])
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            
              
            

                        if user && user.jwt_revoked?(payload["jti"], payload["exp"])
          
      91.

                          render json: UserSerializer.render_error("Token has been revoked", :unauthorized), status: :unauthorized

                  # GET /api/v1/auth/sessions
          
      138.

                  def index
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            
              
            

                    if current_user
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            
              
            

                      sessions = current_user.allowlisted_jwts.order(created_at: :desc).map do |jwt|
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            
              
            

                        begin
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            
              
            

                          {
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            
              
            

                            id: jwt.id,
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            
              
            

                            created_at: jwt.created_at,
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            
              
            

                            expires_at: Time.at(JWT.decode(
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            
              
            

                              jwt.token.to_s,
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            
              
            

                              Rails.application.credentials.devise_jwt_secret_key!,
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            
              
            

                              true,
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            
              
            

                              { algorithm: "HS256" }
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            
              
            

                            ).first["exp"]).utc,
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            
              
            

                            current: jwt.jti == current_jwt_payload["jti"]
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            
              
            

                          }
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            
              
            

                        rescue JWT::DecodeError => e
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            
              
            

                          Rails.logger.error("Error decoding JWT: #{e.message}")
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            
              
            

                          nil
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            
              
            

                        end
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            
              
            

                      end.compact
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158.

                    else
          
      161.

                    end
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            
              
            

                  end

                  # DELETE /api/v1/auth/sessions/:id
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            
              
            

                  def destroy_session
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            
              
            

                    if current_user
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            
              
            

                      jwt = current_user.allowlisted_jwts.find_by(id: params[:id])
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            
              
            

                      if jwt
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            
              
            

                        current_user.revoke_jwt(jwt.jti, Devise.jwt.expiration_time.from_now)
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            
              
            

                        render json: { message: "Session revoked successfully" }
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            
              
            

                      else
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            
              
            

                        render json: { message: "Session not found" }, status: :not_found
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            
              
            

                      end
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            
              
            

                    else
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            
              
            

                      render json: UserSerializer.render_error("Not authenticated", :unauthorized), status: :unauthorized
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179.

                  # DELETE /api/v1/auth/sessions/others
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            
              
            

                  def destroy_all
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            
              
            

                    if current_user && current_jwt_payload
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            
              
            

                      current_jti = current_jwt_payload["jti"]
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            
              
            

                      current_user.allowlisted_jwts.where.not(jti: current_jti).each do |jwt|
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            
              
            

                        current_user.revoke_jwt(jwt.jti, Devise.jwt.expiration_time.from_now)
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            
              
            

                      end
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            
              
            

                      render json: { message: "All other sessions revoked successfully" }
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            
              
            

                    else
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            
              
            

                      render json: UserSerializer.render_error("Not authenticated", :unauthorized), status: :unauthorized
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192.

    193.

                  def destroy_current

                  def user_params
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            
              
            

                    params.require(:user).permit(:email, :password)

                  end
          
      203.

                  def ensure_params_exist
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            
              
            

                    return if params[:user].present?
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            
              
            

                    render json: UserSerializer.render_error("Missing user parameter", :unprocessable_entity), status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            

            
              
            

                  def current_jwt_payload
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            
              
            

                    return nil unless request.headers["Authorization"]
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            

            
              
            

                    token = request.headers["Authorization"].split(" ").last
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            

            
              
            

                    begin
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            

            
              
            

                      JWT.decode(
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            

            
              
            

                        token,
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            

            
              
            

                        Rails.application.credentials.devise_jwt_secret_key!,
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            

            
              
            

                        true,
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            

            
              
            

                        { algorithm: "HS256" }
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            

            
              
            

                      ).first
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            

            
              
            

                    rescue JWT::DecodeError => e
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            

            
              
            

                      Rails.logger.error("Error decoding JWT in current_jwt_payload: #{e.message}")
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            

            
              
            

                      nil
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            

            
              
            

            end
          
      228.

                  def index

    9. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Get shares where the user's organizations are the target

                    Rails.logger.debug "=== DEBUG: SharesController#index ==="
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            
              
            

                    Rails.logger.debug "Current.organization: #{Current.organization.inspect}"

    12. 
            

            
              
            

                    
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            
              
            

                    shares = Share.where(target_organization: Current.organization)

    14.

      16.

                    begin

                  def create
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            
              
            

                    Rails.logger.debug "=== DEBUG: SharesController#create ==="
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            
              
            

                    Rails.logger.debug "Params: #{params.inspect}"
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            
              
            

                    Rails.logger.debug "Current.organization: #{Current.organization.inspect}"

    38. 
            

            
              
            

                    
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Extract target organization IDs from params
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            
              
            

                    target_organization_ids = params[:target_organization_ids] || []
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            
              
            

                    Rails.logger.debug "Target organization IDs: #{target_organization_ids.inspect}"
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Ensure target_organization_ids is an array of strings or integers
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            
              
            

                    target_organization_ids = Array(target_organization_ids).map(&:to_s)
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            
              
            

                    Rails.logger.debug "Processed target organization IDs: #{target_organization_ids.inspect}"
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Skip shares creation if no target organizations specified
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            
              
            

                    if target_organization_ids.empty?
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            
              
            

                      render json: { error: "No target organizations specified" }, status: :unprocessable_entity

      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            
              
            

                    shares = target_organization_ids.map do |target_organization_id|
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            
              
            

                      Rails.logger.debug "Creating share for target_organization_id: #{target_organization_id}"
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            
              
            

                      share = Share.new(
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            
              
            

                        creator: current_user,
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            
              
            

                        source_organization: Current.organization,
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            
              
            

                        target_organization_id: target_organization_id,
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            
              
            

                        shareable: @shareable,
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            
              
            

                        permission: share_params[:permission],
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            
              
            

                        reshareable: share_params[:reshareable]
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            
              
            

                      )
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            
              
            

                      Rails.logger.debug "Share valid? #{share.valid?}"
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            
              
            

                      Rails.logger.debug "Share errors: #{share.errors.full_messages}" unless share.valid?
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            
              
            

                      share
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      68.

      69.

                    Rails.logger.debug "All valid? #{shares.all?(&:valid?)}"
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            
              
            

                    if shares.all?(&:valid?) && shares.any?
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            
              
            

                      Share.transaction do

    73. 
            

            
              
            

                        shares.each do |share|

                          share.save!

      79.

                    else
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            
              
            

                      errors = shares.map { |s| s.errors.full_messages }.flatten.uniq
          
      81.

                      render json: { errors: errors }, status: :unprocessable_entity

                  def accept_all
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            
              
            

                    Rails.logger.debug "=== DEBUG: SharesController#accept_all ==="
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            
              
            

                    Rails.logger.debug "Current.organization: #{Current.organization.inspect}"

    126. 
            

            
              
            

                    
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            
              
            

                    shares = Share.where(target_organization: Current.organization, status: :pending)

                    Rails.logger.debug "Found shares: #{shares.count}"

      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136.

      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            
              
            

                  rescue => e
          
      139.

                          per_page: (params[:per_page] || 10).to_s
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            
              
            

                        }
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            
              
            

                      )
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            
              
            

                    else
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            
              
            

                      begin
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            
              
            

                        per_page = (params[:per_page] || 10).to_i
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            
              
            

                        @pagy, @visits = pagy(visits_scope, limit: per_page)

    37. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38.

      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            
              
            

                          @visits,
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            
              
            

                          pagy: {
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            
              
            

                            current_page: @pagy.page,

                            per_page: per_page.to_s
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            
              
            

                          }
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            
              
            

                        )

    47. 
            

            
              
            

                      rescue Pagy::OverflowError
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            
              
            

                        # If page is out of bounds, return the last page
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            
              
            

                        last_page = (visits_scope.count.to_f / per_page).ceil
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            
              
            

                        @pagy, @visits = pagy(visits_scope, page: last_page)
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            
              
            

                        render json: VisitSerializer.render_collection(
          
      52.

                          @visits,

    59.

                  def ensure_valid_restaurant

                  def render_error(message, status = :unprocessable_entity)

    164. 
            

            
              
            

                    render json: {

                        code: "unprocessable_entity",

    168. 
            

            
              
            

                        detail: message
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            
              
            

                      } ],
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            
              
            

                      meta: { timestamp: Time.current.iso8601 }
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            
              
            

                    }, status: status
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            
              
            

                end

              end

                    def apply_filters(scope)

    51.

    52. 
            

            
              
            

                      scope = scope.tagged_with(params[:tag]) if params[:tag].present?
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            
              
            

                      scope
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      55.

                    def apply_ordering(scope, field, direction)
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            
              
            

                      case field
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            
              
            

                      when 'distance'
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            
              
            

                        if params[:latitude].present? && params[:longitude].present?
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            
              
            

                          @user_location = [params[:latitude].to_f, params[:longitude].to_f]
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            
              
            

                          scope = scope.order_by_distance_from(@user_location)
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            
              
            

                          scope = scope.reorder("distance #{direction}") if direction != 'asc'
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            
              
            

                        end
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            
              
            

                      when 'created_at'
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            
              
            

                        scope = scope.order(created_at: direction)
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            
              
            

                      else
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            
              
            

                        scope = scope.order(Arel.sql("LOWER(COALESCE(restaurants.#{field}, google_restaurants.#{field})) #{direction}, restaurants.id"))
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            
              
            

                      end
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            
              
            

                      scope
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72.

            module CuisineTypeValidation

              extend ActiveSupport::Concern

              def validate_cuisine_type(cuisine_type_name)
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.debug "=== DEBUG: Validating cuisine type: #{cuisine_type_name} ==="
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.debug "Available types: #{CuisineType.pluck(:name).join(', ')}"
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            
              
            

                
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            
              
            

                if cuisine_type_name.blank?
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            
              
            

                  available_types = CuisineType.pluck(:name).join(", ")
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            
              
            

                  return [ false, "Cuisine type is required. Available types: #{available_types}" ]
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            
              
            

                cuisine_type = CuisineType.find_by(name: cuisine_type_name.downcase)
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.debug "Found cuisine type: #{cuisine_type.inspect}"
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            
              
            

                
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            
              
            

                unless cuisine_type
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            
              
            

                  available_types = CuisineType.pluck(:name).join(", ")
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            
              
            

                  error_message = "Invalid cuisine type: #{cuisine_type_name}. Available types: #{available_types}"
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.debug "Error: #{error_message}"
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            
              
            

                  return [ false, error_message ]
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            
              
            

                [ true, cuisine_type ]
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            
              
            

            end

                def find_or_create_google_restaurant

    90.

                  # Ensure latitude and longitude are present

                  if latitude.blank? || longitude.blank?

      96.

      97.

                    gr.name = name

      115.

            class ContactsController < ApplicationController

              include Pagy::Backend

              before_action :authenticate_user!
          
      4.

              before_action :set_contact, only: [ :show, :edit, :update, :destroy ]
