              def index
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            
              
            

                items_per_page = params[:per_page].to_i.positive? ? params[:per_page].to_i : 12
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            
              
            

                page = params[:page].to_i.positive? ? params[:page].to_i : 1
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            
              
            

                contacts = Current.organization.contacts
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            
              
            

                contacts = contacts.search(params[:search]) if params[:search].present?
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            
              
            

                contacts = case params[:order_by]
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            
              
            

                when "name"
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            
              
            

                    contacts.order(name: params[:order_direction] || :asc)
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            
              
            

                when "email"
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            
              
            

                    contacts.order(email: params[:order_direction] || :asc)
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            
              
            

                when "visits"
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            
              
            

                    contacts.left_joins(:visits)
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            
              
            

                           .group(:id)
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            
              
            

                           .order("COUNT(visits.id) #{params[:order_direction] || 'desc'}")
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            
              
            

                else
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            
              
            

                    contacts.order(created_at: params[:order_direction] || :desc)
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26.

    27.

            class DebugController < ApplicationController

              def test_s3
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            
              
            

                begin
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Try to find the blob first
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            
              
            

                  blob = ActiveStorage::Blob.find_by!(key: params[:blob_id])
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Try to get the content of the file directly
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            
              
            

                  content = blob.service.download(blob.key)
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            
              
            

                  render plain: "S3 access successful! File size: #{content.bytesize} bytes"
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            
              
            

                rescue ActiveRecord::RecordNotFound => e
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            
              
            

                  render plain: "Blob not found with key: #{params[:blob_id]}", status: 404
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            
              
            

                rescue => e
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            
              
            

                  render plain: "S3 access error: #{e.class} - #{e.message}\n#{e.backtrace.join("\n")}", status: 500
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            
              
            

            end
          
      17.

              def create
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            
              
            

                if params[:images].present?

                  begin

                      params[:images].each do |image|

    19.

    20. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      21.

      22.

                        blob = create_blob_with_checksum(image)
          
      23.

                        blobs_to_purge << blob # Track for cleanup in case of error

    29. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            
              
            

                      # If we get here, clear the blobs_to_purge list (all good)
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            
              
            

                      blobs_to_purge.clear
          
      32.

                    end
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33.

      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            
              
            

                  rescue StandardError => e
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Clean up any orphaned blobs if transaction failed
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39.

              def create_blob_with_checksum(file)
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            
              
            

                service = ActiveStorage::Blob.service
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            
              
            

                # Generate a timestamp-based key that matches what set_filename would create
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            
              
            

                timestamp = Time.current.strftime("%Y%m%d%H%M%S")
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            
              
            

                original_filename = file.original_filename
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            
              
            

                extension = File.extname(original_filename).downcase
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            
              
            

                basename = File.basename(original_filename, extension)
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            
              
            

                truncated_name = basename.truncate(12, omission: "")
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            
              
            

                key = "#{timestamp}_#{truncated_name}#{extension}"
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            
              
            

                # Calculate checksum manually in advance
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            
              
            

                checksum = Digest::MD5.file(file.tempfile.path).base64digest
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            
              
            

                # Create blob with the timestamp-based key
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            
              
            

                blob = ActiveStorage::Blob.create!(
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            
              
            

                  key: key,
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            
              
            

                  filename: file.original_filename,  # Keep original filename for display
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            
              
            

                  byte_size: file.size,
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            
              
            

                  checksum: checksum,
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            
              
            

                  content_type: file.content_type,
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            
              
            

                  service_name: service.name
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            
              
            

                )
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            
              
            

                # Upload the file with the same key
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            
              
            

                service.upload(
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            
              
            

                  key,
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            
              
            

                  file,
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            
              
            

                  content_type: file.content_type
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            
              
            

                )
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            
              
            

                blob
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            
              
            

              def set_restaurant
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139.

      141.

              def set_image_and_imageable
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            
              
            

                @image = Image.find(params[:id])

                @imageable = @image.imageable
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            
              
            

                unless current_user_can_delete_image?
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.warn "User #{current_user.id} attempted to delete image #{@image.id} without permission"
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            
              
            

                  respond_to do |format|
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            
              
            

                    format.html { redirect_to root_path, alert: "You do not have permission to delete this image." }
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            
              
            

                    format.json { render json: { success: false, errors: [ "Permission denied" ] }, status: :forbidden }
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      156.

              def current_user_can_delete_image?
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            
              
            

                return false unless @imageable && Current.organization
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            
              
            

                
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            
              
            

                case @imageable
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            
              
            

                when Restaurant, Visit
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            
              
            

                  @imageable.organization_id == Current.organization.id
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            
              
            

                else
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            
              
            

                  false
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166.

      167.

              def edit_polymorphic_path(imageable)
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            
              
            

                case imageable
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            
              
            

                when Restaurant
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            
              
            

                  edit_restaurant_path(id: imageable.id, locale: current_locale)
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            
              
            

                when Visit
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            
              
            

                  edit_visit_path(id: imageable.id, locale: current_locale)
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            
              
            

                else
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            
              
            

                  root_path
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178.

    1. 
            

            
              
            

            class ListRestaurantsController < ApplicationController
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            
              
            

              include ActionView::RecordIdentifier
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            
              
            

              before_action :authenticate_user!
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            
              
            

              before_action :set_list
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            
              
            

              before_action :ensure_editable, except: [ :import, :import_all ]
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            
              
            

              include Pagy::Backend
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      8.

              def index
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            
              
            

                @pagy, @restaurants = pagy(
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            
              
            

                  Current.organization.restaurants.search_by_full_text(params[:query])
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            
              
            

                    .includes(:cuisine_type)
          
      12.

                    .order(:name)

              def set_list
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            
              
            

                # Find list that is either owned by or shared with the current organization
          
      105.

                @list = List.find(params[:list_id])

    106. 
            

            
              
            

                
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107.

    108. 
            

            
              
            

                unless @list.viewable_by?(Current.organization)
          
      109.

                  raise ActiveRecord::RecordNotFound
          
      110.

                end

      112.

              end

    114.

              def index

              def destroy

              def set_list

            class RestaurantsController < ApplicationController
          
      2.

              include ActionView::RecordIdentifier

              include RestaurantManagement

              def index

    16.

                query_params = search_params.merge(order_params)

                @tags = ActsAsTaggableOn::Tag.most_used(10)

              def show
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            
              
            

                @restaurant = Restaurant.find(params[:id])
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            
              
            

                @notes_edit = params[:notes_edit].present?
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            
              
            

                @tags = @restaurant.tags || []
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            
              
            

                # Handle specific turbo frame request for notes
          
      35.

                if turbo_frame_request? && request.headers["Turbo-Frame"] == "restaurant_#{@restaurant.id}_notes"

    36. 
            

            
              
            

                  render partial: "components/notes_component", locals: {
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            
              
            

                    record: @restaurant,
          
      38.

                    notes_edit: @notes_edit
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            
              
            

                  }
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            
              
            

                  return
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            
              
            

                @all_tags = ActsAsTaggableOn::Tag.all
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            
              
            

                @visits = @restaurant.visits
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            
              
            

                if params[:modal] == "cuisine_type"
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.debug "Rendering cuisine type modal"
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            
              
            

                  respond_to do |format|
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            
              
            

                    format.turbo_stream do
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            
              
            

                      render turbo_stream: turbo_stream.update(
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            
              
            

                        "modal",
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            
              
            

                        partial: "restaurants/cuisine_type_modal",
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            
              
            

                        locals: { restaurant: @restaurant }
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            
              
            

                      )
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            
              
            

                    format.html
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            
              
            

                  return
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            
              
            

                @lists = List.accessible_by(Current.user).containing_restaurant(@restaurant)
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            
              
            

                if turbo_frame_request? && params[:turbo_frame] == dom_id(@restaurant, :notes)
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            
              
            

                  render partial: "components/notes_component", locals: {
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            
              
            

                    record: @restaurant,
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            
              
            

                    notes_field: :notes,
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            
              
            

                    container_classes: nil,
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            
              
            

                    notes_edit: @notes_edit
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            
              
            

                  }
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      74.

                @restaurant = Current.organization.restaurants.with_google.includes(:images).find(params[:id])

                load_edit_dependencies
          
      78.

      91.

              def edit_images

              def update
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            
              
            

                @restaurant = Current.organization.restaurants.find(params[:id])
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            
              
            

                load_edit_dependencies
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.debug "\n=== Controller Debug ==="
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.debug "Restaurant before update: #{@restaurant.inspect}"
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.debug "Update params: #{restaurant_params.inspect}"
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.debug "Request format: #{request.format}"
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.debug "Request accepts: #{request.accepts.map(&:to_s).join(', ')}"
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            
              
            

                if @restaurant.update(restaurant_params)
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.debug "Update successful"
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            
              
            

                  respond_to do |format|
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            
              
            

                    format.turbo_stream do
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            
              
            

                      if restaurant_params.key?(:price_level)
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            
              
            

                        render turbo_stream: [
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            
              
            

                          turbo_stream.replace(
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            
              
            

                            dom_id(@restaurant, :price_level),
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            
              
            

                            partial: "restaurants/price_level",
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            
              
            

                            locals: { restaurant: @restaurant }
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            
              
            

                          ),
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            
              
            

                          turbo_stream.replace(
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            
              
            

                            "#{dom_id(@restaurant, :price_level)}_modal_container",
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            
              
            

                            partial: "restaurants/price_level_modal",
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            
              
            

                            locals: { restaurant: @restaurant }
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            
              
            

                          )
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            
              
            

                        ]
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            
              
            

                      elsif restaurant_params.key?(:cuisine_type_id)
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            
              
            

                        render turbo_stream: [
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            
              
            

                          turbo_stream.update("modal", ""),
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            
              
            

                          turbo_stream.replace(
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            
              
            

                            dom_id(@restaurant, :cuisine_type),
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            
              
            

                            partial: "restaurants/cuisine_type",
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            
              
            

                            locals: { restaurant: @restaurant }
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            
              
            

                          )
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            
              
            

                        ]
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            
              
            

                      end
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            
              
            

                    format.html { redirect_to @restaurant, locale: I18n.locale }
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            
              
            

                    format.json { render json: @restaurant }
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            
              
            

                    format.any { head :not_acceptable }
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            
              
            

                else
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.debug "Update failed"
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.debug "Restaurant errors: #{@restaurant.errors.full_messages}"
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.debug "Cuisine types: #{@cuisine_types.inspect}"
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.debug "Flash before: #{flash.inspect}"
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            
              
            

                  flash.now[:alert] = @restaurant.errors.full_messages.join(", ")
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.debug "Flash after: #{flash.inspect}"
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.debug "=== End Controller Debug ==="
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            
              
            

                  respond_to do |format|
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            
              
            

                    format.html { render :edit, status: :unprocessable_entity }
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            
              
            

                    format.turbo_stream { head :unprocessable_entity }
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            
              
            

                    format.json { render json: @restaurant.errors, status: :unprocessable_entity }
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            
              
            

                    format.any { head :not_acceptable }
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            
              
            

              def update_price_level
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            
              
            

                @restaurant = Current.organization.restaurants.find(params[:id])
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            
              
            

                if @restaurant.update(price_level: params[:restaurant][:price_level])
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            
              
            

                  respond_to do |format|
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            
              
            

                    format.turbo_stream do
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            
              
            

                      render turbo_stream: turbo_stream.replace(
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            
              
            

                        dom_id(@restaurant, :price_level),
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            
              
            

                        partial: "restaurants/price_level",
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            
              
            

                        locals: { restaurant: @restaurant }
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            
              
            

                      )
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            
              
            

                    format.html { redirect_to @restaurant, locale: I18n.locale }
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            
              
            

                    format.json { render json: { status: :ok, price_level: @restaurant.price_level } }
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            
              
            

                else
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            
              
            

                  head :unprocessable_entity
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            
              
            

              def create
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            
              
            

                @restaurant = Restaurant.new(restaurant_params)
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            
              
            

                @restaurant.organization = Current.organization
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.debug "\n=== Create Action Debug ==="
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.debug "Restaurant params: #{restaurant_params.inspect}"
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.debug "Request format: #{request.format}"
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            
              
            

                if @restaurant.save
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.debug "Restaurant saved successfully"
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            
              
            

                  respond_to do |format|
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            
              
            

                    format.html { redirect_to restaurant_path(@restaurant, locale: I18n.locale), notice: "Restaurant was successfully created." }
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            
              
            

                    format.json { render json: @restaurant, status: :created, location: restaurant_path(@restaurant, locale: I18n.locale) }
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            
              
            

                else
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.debug "Restaurant save failed: #{@restaurant.errors.full_messages}"
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            
              
            

                  load_edit_dependencies
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            

            
              
            

                  flash.now[:alert] = @restaurant.errors.full_messages.join(", ")
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            
              
            

                  respond_to do |format|
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            

            
              
            

                    format.html { render :new, status: :unprocessable_entity }
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            

            
              
            

                    format.json { render json: @restaurant.errors, status: :unprocessable_entity }
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            

            
              
            

              def destroy
          
      218.

                @restaurant.destroy
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            

            
              
            

                redirect_to restaurants_path, notice: "Restaurant was successfully removed from your list."
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            

            
              
            

              def search

                respond_to do |format|

                  format.html { render partial: "search_form" }
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            

            
              
            

                  format.turbo_stream
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            

            
              
            

              private
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            

            
              
            

              def render_error_response
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            

            
              
            

                if hotwire_native_app?
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            

            
              
            

                  render :edit_tags_native, status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      234. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    234. 
            

            
              
            

                else
          
      235.

              def parse_order_params

                order_field = params[:order_by] || RestaurantQuery::DEFAULT_ORDER[:field]

      252.

            class SharesController < ApplicationController

      6.

              def create
          
      7.

                recipient_ids = params[:recipient_ids] || []

    8. 
            

            
              
            

                @shareable = List.find(params[:shareable_id])

    9. 
            

            
              
            

                
          
      10.

                shares = recipient_ids.map do |recipient_id|
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            
              
            

                  Share.new(
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12.

      17.

                  )
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19.

                if shares.all?(&:valid?)

                  Share.transaction do

                    shares.each do |share|

                      share.save!

      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      27.

                  redirect_to list_path(id: @shareable.id), notice: t('.success')
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            
              
            

                else
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            
              
            

                  errors = shares.map { |s| s.errors.full_messages }.flatten.uniq

                if @share.recipient == current_user

              end
          
      42.

              def decline

                if @share.recipient == current_user

              def set_shareable

            class SubscriptionsController < ApplicationController

              def create

                # Check honeypot

    4. 
            

            
              
            

                if params[:website].present?
          
      5.

                  head :ok

                def set_visit
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            
              
            

                  @visit = Current.organization.visits.find(params[:visit_id])

      39.

                def index
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            
              
            

                  @order_by = params[:order_by] || "date"
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            
              
            

                  @order_direction = %w[asc desc].include?(params[:order_direction]) ? params[:order_direction] : "desc"
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            
              
            

                  @search = params[:search]
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            
              
            

                  items_per_page = params[:per_page].to_i.positive? ? params[:per_page].to_i : 12
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            
              
            

                  page = params[:page].to_i.positive? ? params[:page].to_i : 1
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            
              
            

                  visits = Current.organization.visits
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            
              
            

                    .includes(:restaurant, { contacts: { avatar_attachment: :blob } }, images: { file_attachment: :blob })
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            
              
            

                  visits = visits.search_by_full_text(@search) if @search.present?
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            
              
            

                  visits = case @order_by
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            
              
            

                  when "date"
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            
              
            

                            visits.order(Arel.sql("date #{@order_direction}"))
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            
              
            

                  when "restaurant_name"
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            
              
            

                            visits.joins(:restaurant)
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            
              
            

                                 .order(Arel.sql("LOWER(restaurants.name) #{@order_direction}"))
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            
              
            

                  when "rating"
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            
              
            

                            visits.order(Arel.sql("rating #{@order_direction} NULLS LAST"))
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            
              
            

                  when "created_at"
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            
              
            

                            visits.order(Arel.sql("created_at #{@order_direction}"))
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            
              
            

                  else
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            
              
            

                            visits.order(Arel.sql("date DESC"))
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            
              
            

                  @pagy, @visits = pagy_countless(visits, items: items_per_page, page: page)

      36.

                  respond_to do |format|

                def valid_restaurant?(restaurant_id)

                def ensure_valid_restaurant
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            
              
            

                  return if params[:visit].blank? || params[:visit][:restaurant_id].blank?
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            
              
            

                  unless valid_restaurant?(params[:visit][:restaurant_id])
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            
              
            

                    flash.now[:alert] = I18n.t("errors.visits.invalid_restaurant")
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            
              
            

                    @visit ||= Visit.new
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            
              
            

                    @visit.errors.add(:restaurant_id, :invalid)
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            
              
            

                    render :new, status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      113.

                def save_visit(render_action)
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            
              
            

                  if @visit.restaurant_id.blank?
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            
              
            

                    flash.now[:alert] = I18n.t("errors.visits.restaurant_required")
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            
              
            

                    @visit.errors.add(:restaurant_id, :blank)
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            
              
            

                    render render_action, status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            
              
            

                  elsif @visit.persisted? || @visit.save
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            
              
            

                    if params[:visit][:images].present?
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            
              
            

                      begin
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            
              
            

                        result = ImageProcessorService.new(@visit, params[:visit][:images]).process
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            
              
            

                        unless result.success?
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            
              
            

                          flash[:alert] = result.error
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            
              
            

                          raise StandardError, "Image processing failed"
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            
              
            

                        end
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            
              
            

                        redirect_to visits_path, notice: I18n.t("notices.visits.#{render_action == :new ? 'created' : 'updated'}")
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            
              
            

                      rescue StandardError => e
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            
              
            

                        Rails.logger.error "Image processing failed: #{e.message}"
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            
              
            

                        @visit.destroy if render_action == :new
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            
              
            

                        render render_action, status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            
              
            

                      end
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            
              
            

                    else
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            
              
            

                      redirect_to visits_path, notice: I18n.t("notices.visits.#{render_action == :new ? 'created' : 'updated'}")
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            
              
            

                  else
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            
              
            

                    flash.now[:alert] = I18n.t("errors.visits.save_failed")
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            
              
            

                    render render_action, status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      142.

              def self.frequently_used_with(organization, visit, limit: 5)
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            
              
            

                available_contacts = organization.contacts.where.not(id: visit.contact_ids)
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            
              
            

                total_contacts = available_contacts.count
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27.

    28.

    29.

      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            
              
            

                  available_contacts
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31.

    32.

      33.

              def update_location

                if latitude.present? && longitude.present?

      54.

    55.

      56.

                Rails.logger.error "Failed to update location: #{e.message}"
          
      57.

                errors.add(:location, "could not be updated")
          
      58.

            class Image < ApplicationRecord

              validates :file, presence: true

              private

    13. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      14.
