              def set_filename
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            
              
            

                return unless file.attached?
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            
              
            

                begin
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            
              
            

                  original_filename = file.blob.filename.to_s
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            
              
            

                  extension = File.extname(original_filename).downcase
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            
              
            

                  basename = File.basename(original_filename, extension)
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Create SEO-friendly base name
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            
              
            

                  sanitized_name = basename
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            
              
            

                    .unicode_normalize(:nfkd)
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            
              
            

                    .encode("ASCII", replace: "")
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            
              
            

                    .downcase
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            
              
            

                    .gsub(/[^a-z0-9\-_]+/, "-")
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            
              
            

                    .gsub(/-{2,}/, "-")
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            
              
            

                    .truncate(50, omission: "")
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            
              
            

                    .gsub(/\A-|-\z/, "")
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Generate unique filename
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            
              
            

                  unique_suffix = SecureRandom.hex(4)  # 8 characters, sufficient for uniqueness
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            
              
            

                  new_filename = "#{sanitized_name}-#{unique_suffix}#{extension}"
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Update blob directly without copying
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            
              
            

                  file.blob.update!(filename: new_filename)
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            
              
            

                rescue StandardError => e
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.error "Error in set_filename: #{e.message}"
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.error e.backtrace.join("\n")
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            
              
            

                true
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            
              
            

              def purge_file
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            
              
            

                file.purge if file.attached?
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            
              
            

              rescue => e
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.error "Error purging file: #{e.message}"
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            
              
            

            end
          
      52.

              # Find all lists accessible to a user based on their organization memberships

              # Check if a list is viewable by a user or organization

              # If passed a user, checks if the user belongs to the list's organization or any organization the list is shared with

              # If passed an organization, checks if the organization owns the list or the list is shared with it
          
      59.

              def viewable_by?(entity)
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            
              
            

                return false unless entity
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            
              
            

                
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            
              
            

                if entity.is_a?(User)
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            
              
            

                  # User can view if they belong to the list's organization
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            
              
            

                  return true if entity.organizations.exists?(id: organization.id)
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            
              
            

                  
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            
              
            

                  # User can view if the list is shared with any of their organizations

    67. 
            

            
              
            

                  user_org_ids = entity.organizations.pluck(:id)
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            
              
            

                  shares.accepted.where(target_organization_id: user_org_ids).exists?
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            
              
            

                elsif entity.is_a?(Organization)

    70. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Organization can view if it owns the list
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            
              
            

                  return true if entity.id == organization.id
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            
              
            

                  
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Organization can view if the list is shared with it
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            
              
            

                  shares.accepted.where(target_organization_id: entity.id).exists?
          
      75.

                else

    76.

              # Check if a list is editable by a user or organization

              def editable_by?(entity)
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            
              
            

                return false unless entity
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            
              
            

                
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            
              
            

                if entity.is_a?(User)
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Only members of the list's organization can edit it
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            
              
            

                  entity.organizations.exists?(id: organization.id)
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            
              
            

                elsif entity.is_a?(Organization)
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Only the owning organization can edit it
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            
              
            

                  entity.id == organization.id
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            
              
            

                else
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93.

    94.

              # Check if a list is deletable by a user or organization

              # If passed a user, checks if the user belongs to the list's organization

              # If passed an organization, checks if the organization owns the list
          
      100.

              def deletable_by?(entity)
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            
              
            

                return false unless entity
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            
              
            

                
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            
              
            

                if entity.is_a?(User)
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Only members of the list's organization can delete it
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            
              
            

                  entity.organizations.exists?(id: organization.id)
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            
              
            

                elsif entity.is_a?(Organization)
          
      107.

                  # Only the owning organization can delete it
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108.

      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            
              
            

                else
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            
              
            

                  false
          
      111.

                def self.with_google

            class Share < ApplicationRecord

              def cannot_share_with_self

    40. 
            

            
              
            

                if source_organization_id == target_organization_id

                  errors.add(:target_organization_id, "can't be the same as source organization")

              def can_be_reshared?

                reshareable? && accepted?

      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            
              
            

              def validate_status_transition
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            
              
            

                if status_was == "accepted" && status == "pending"
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            
              
            

                  errors.add(:status, "cannot transition back to pending once accepted")
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            
              
            

                  raise StandardError, "Cannot transition from accepted to pending"
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            
              
            

            end

            class User < ApplicationRecord

                def filter_by_organization(scoped)

                def search(scoped)

    29. 
            

            
              
            

                  if params[:search].present?

                def filter_by_tag(scoped)

    37. 
            

            
              
            

                  params[:tag].present? ? scoped.tagged_with(params[:tag]) : scoped

                def sort(scoped)
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            
              
            

                  order_field = params[:order_by] || DEFAULT_ORDER[:field]
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            
              
            

                  order_direction = params[:order_direction] || DEFAULT_ORDER[:direction]
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            
              
            

                  case order_field
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            
              
            

                  when "distance"

    46. 
            

            
              
            

                    sort_by_distance(scoped)

    47. 
            

            
              
            

                  when "created_at"
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            
              
            

                    scoped.order(restaurants: { created_at: order_direction })
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            
              
            

                  when "rating"
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            
              
            

                    scoped.order(restaurants: { rating: order_direction })
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            
              
            

                  when "price_level"
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            
              
            

                    scoped.order(restaurants: { price_level: order_direction })
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            
              
            

                  else
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Fix the reference to google_restaurants by using the proper join alias
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            
              
            

                    scoped.order(Arel.sql("LOWER(restaurants.name) #{order_direction}"))
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            
              
            

                end

                def sort_by_distance(scoped)
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            
              
            

                  return scoped unless params[:latitude].present? && params[:longitude].present?
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            
              
            

                  lat = params[:latitude].to_f
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            
              
            

                  lon = params[:longitude].to_f
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Using the Pythagorean theorem for approximate distance calculation in tests
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            
              
            

                  # This avoids the need for PostGIS functions in tests
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            
              
            

                  scoped.select("restaurants.*,
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            
              
            

                    SQRT(POW(restaurants.latitude - #{lat}, 2) + POW(restaurants.longitude - #{lon}, 2)) as distance")
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            
              
            

                    .order("distance")
          
      70.

              def sort(scoped)

    44.

              def self.render_collection(resources, meta: {}, pagy: nil)
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            
              
            

                serialized_resources = resources.map { |resource|

    83. 
            

            
              
            

                  serializer = new(resource)
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            
              
            

                  serialized = serializer.serialize
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85.

      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            
              
            

                  {
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88.

              def blob_path(attachment)
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            
              
            

                return nil unless attachment.attached?
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.application.routes.url_helpers.rails_blob_path(
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            
              
            

                  attachment,
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31.

      32.

      33.

              rescue StandardError => e
          
      34.

      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            
              
            

              def self.render_success(user, token = nil)
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            
              
            

                # With Devise JWT, we don't need to include the token in the response body
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            
              
            

                # as it's already in the Authorization header
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            
              
            

                super(user)
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            
              
            

              def self.render_error(errors)
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            
              
            

                {
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            
              
            

                  status: "error",
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            
              
            

                  errors: errors.messages.flat_map { |attr, messages|
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            
              
            

                    messages.map { |msg|
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            
              
            

                      {
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            
              
            

                        code: "validation_error",
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            
              
            

                        detail: msg,
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            
              
            

                        source: { pointer: "/data/attributes/#{attr}" }
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            
              
            

                      }
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            
              
            

                    }
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            
              
            

                  },
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            
              
            

                  meta: {
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            
              
            

                    timestamp: Time.current.iso8601

    24. 
            

            
              
            

                  }

    25. 
            

            
              
            

                }

    26. 
            

            
              
            

              end

    app/services/generate_unique_filename_service.rb

    0.0% lines covered

    100.0% branches covered

    44 relevant lines. 0 lines covered and 44 lines missed.
    0 total branches, 0 branches covered and 0 branches missed. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1. 
            

            
              
            

            # frozen_string_literal: true
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            
              
            

            class GenerateUniqueFilenameService
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            
              
            

              class Error < StandardError; end
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            
              
            

              class ValidationError < Error; end
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            
              
            

              VALID_SUFFIXES = %i[thumb sm md lg original].freeze
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            
              
            

              VALID_PREFIXES = %i[avatar contact restaurant visit].freeze
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            
              
            

              VALID_EXTENSIONS = %w[.jpg .jpeg .png .gif .webp].freeze
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            
              
            

              DEFAULT_SIZE = 12
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            
              
            

              FILENAME_PARTS = [].freeze
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            
              
            

              class << self
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            
              
            

                def call(original_filename:, suffix: nil, prefix: nil, size: DEFAULT_SIZE)
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            
              
            

                  new(original_filename:, suffix:, prefix:, size:).generate
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            
              
            

              def initialize(original_filename:, suffix: nil, prefix: nil, size: DEFAULT_SIZE)
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            
              
            

                @original_filename = original_filename.to_s
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            
              
            

                @suffix = suffix
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            
              
            

                @prefix = prefix
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            
              
            

                @size = size
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            
              
            

                validate_inputs!
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            
              
            

              def generate
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            
              
            

                # Get the original extension if any
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            
              
            

                extension = File.extname(@original_filename).downcase
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            
              
            

                extension = ".webp" if extension.empty? # Default to .webp if no extension
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            
              
            

                # Generate a unique identifier
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            
              
            

                unique_id = SecureRandom.alphanumeric(@size)
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            
              
            

                # Build the filename
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            
              
            

                filename = FILENAME_PARTS.dup
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            
              
            

                filename << @prefix if @prefix && VALID_PREFIXES.include?(@prefix)
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            
              
            

                filename << unique_id
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            
              
            

                filename << @suffix.to_s if @suffix && VALID_SUFFIXES.include?(@suffix)
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            
              
            

                # Join with underscores and add extension
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            
              
            

                result = filename.join("_")
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            
              
            

                result << extension
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            
              
            

                result
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      47.

              def validate_inputs!

              def validate_upload!

              def process_variant(suffix, size, quality)
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            
              
            

                validate_quality!(quality)
          
      74.

                Rails.logger.debug "Processing variant: size=#{size}, quality=#{quality}"
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            
              
            

                # Handle both ActionDispatch::Http::UploadedFile and Tempfile
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                source_path = @upload.respond_to?(:tempfile) ? @upload.tempfile.path : @upload.path
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.debug "Source path: #{source_path}"
          
      79.

                processor = ImageProcessing::MiniMagick

                  .source(source_path)

                  .resize_to_limit(size[0], size[1])
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            
              
            

                  .convert(OUTPUT_FORMAT)
          
      84.

                  .saver(quality: quality)

                processed = processor.call

                Rails.logger.debug "Variant processed, path: #{processed.path}"
          
      88.

              def validate_quality!(quality)

    104. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0

      43.

                def self.find_or_create(place_data)

                def self.create(user:, google_restaurant:)

                class ManagerService

                  MAX_TAGS = 30

                  MAX_TAG_LENGTH = 50
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      7.

                  def initialize(record)

    8. 
            

            
              
            

                    @record = record

                  end
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            
              
            

                  def update(tags)
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            
              
            

                    return Result.error("Invalid type") unless tags.nil? || tags.is_a?(String) || tags.is_a?(Array)
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            
              
            

                    return Result.error("No tags provided") if tags.nil?
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            
              
            

                    tags = parse_tags(tags)
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            
              
            

                    return Result.error("Invalid tag format") unless tags
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            
              
            

                    if tags.any? { |tag| tag.length > MAX_TAG_LENGTH }
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            
              
            

                      return Result.error("Tags must be #{MAX_TAG_LENGTH} characters or less")
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            
              
            

                    if tags.size > MAX_TAGS
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            
              
            

                      return Result.error("Maximum #{MAX_TAGS} tags allowed")
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            
              
            

                    @record.tag_list = tags
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            
              
            

                    if @record.save
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            
              
            

                      Result.success
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            
              
            

                    else
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            
              
            

                      Result.error("Failed to save tags")
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            
              
            

                    end

                  rescue => e

                  def parse_tags(tags)

    45.
